name: Haxe Night
description: A dark and simple style for haxe.org. The style contains base16 syntax highlighting and is for haxe.org, blog.haxe.org, api.haxe.org, lib.haxe.org, manual.haxe.org and code.haxe.org. old.haxe.org is not supported - yet

user.name: Jack Magnus
user.about: just a dude who likes his internet dark and easy to the eyes. please email me with any questions. jackm@minobar.com

additional_info:
